title: Trump Names SEC Crypto Task Force Head Selig as Next Nominee to Run U.S. CFTC
contentSnippet: If confirmed, current SEC official Mike Selig would take over the U.S. commodities watchdog as it's poised to be given wide authority over crypto.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: First U.S. Spot XRP ETF Surpasses $100M in Assets Under Management
contentSnippet: In Brazil, the Hashdex Nasdaq XRP (XRPH11) has accumulated around $52 million in assets, despite launching first.

title: ISM Manufacturing PMI suggests Bitcoin cycle may extend beyond historical norm
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s market cycles may stretch longer as ISM manufacturing data remains weak, hinting at extended macro headwinds and slower business recovery.

title: AI Biodefense Startup Valthos Launches With $30 Million, OpenAI Backing
contentSnippet: New York-based startup Valthos is developing AI systems to identify and counter biological threats before they spread.

title: SOL Now on Fidelity’s Retail Platform as Price Tests $195 While $188 Support Draws Focus
contentSnippet: SOL lands on Fidelity's retail trading platform, Gemini launches the Solana edition of its credit card, and $188 emerges as the key support level to watch.

title: Mid-tier Bitcoin miners gain ground, reshaping post-halving competition
contentSnippet: Smaller Bitcoin miners surge in hashrate and debt as competition intensifies post-halving, reshaping the industry’s balance of power.

title: Ledger’s new multisig interface sparks backlash over 'cash cow' fees
contentSnippet: Ledger’s new multisig app earns praise for tech upgrades but sparks backlash over added transaction fees.

title: Bitcoin Treasury Firms Now Valued at Less Than Their BTC Holdings Amid Crumbled Sentiment
contentSnippet: Sector giant Strategy (MSTR) still trades at a premium to its bitcoin stack, but maybe not for long if the trend continues.

title: Rumble to Roll Out Bitcoin Tipping for 51 Million Users in December
contentSnippet: The feature is developed with Tether and was announced at the Plan ₿ Forum in Lugano, Switzerland. The first BTC tip was sent to content creator David Freiheit.

title: ETH $10K Path Projected by Analyst as Ether Whales and Sharks Show ‘Signs of Confidence’
contentSnippet: Analysts on X outlined five-digit targets for ether while Santiment said larger wallets have started adding again, framing a longer path higher if resistance gives way.

title: XRP price eyes rally to $3.45 after Ripple CEO tells investors to ‘lock in’
contentSnippet: XRP eyes a breakout toward $3–$3.45 as strong technical support and Ripple’s expanding institutional push fuel renewed bullish momentum.

title: State of Crypto: Skinny Master Accounts and Stablecoins
contentSnippet: Fed. Governor Waller's proposal could boost stablecoin firms in the U.S.

title: Kyrgyzstan Launches National Stablecoin, Sets Up Cryptocurrency Reserve: CZ
contentSnippet: The country has also legally recognized its central bank digital currency (CBDC), the digital som, with plans to pilot government-related payments with it.

title: Don’t just tokenize assets, build the institutions to back them
contentSnippet: RWA tokenization faces criticism, but regulatory clarity and institutional adoption prove it’s building the foundation for finance’s future.

title: Bitmine’s Tom Lee Sees Crypto Rally Into Year-End, Says S&P 500 Could Climb Another 10%
contentSnippet: On CNBC, Tom Lee said Fed cuts and fading skepticism could lift U.S. stocks into year-end and that crypto may rebound as open interest resets and technicals improve.

title: Meet the Roaring Kitty of Beyond Meat: 'I Would Feel Guilty Selling'
contentSnippet: Beyond Meat bull Dimitri "Capybara Stocks" Semenikhin helped pump the latest meme stock, but said he'll feel relieved once the chaos cools.

title: Countries across Africa approve new crypto laws as adoption grows
contentSnippet: Crypto laws are popping up across Africa as countries race to offer favorable conditions to the crypto industry and balance consumer safety concerns.

title: No HMRC letter? UK crypto investors may still owe taxes, expert warns
contentSnippet: HMRC has issued 65,000 crypto tax warning letters, but experts say UK investors who haven’t been contacted could still owe taxes.

title: North Korea’s AI-Powered Hackers Are Redefining Crypto Crime
contentSnippet: Mysten Labs’ chief cryptographer warns that artificial intelligence, not quantum computing, poses the real near-term threat to blockchain security.

title: Ferrari to launch digital token to let fans bid on its Le Mans-winning race car
contentSnippet: Ferrari is deepening its crypto push with a new digital token for its top clients, letting them bid on the Le Mans-winning 499P as part of a limited auction set to launch in 2027.

title: Spot Ether ETFs see outflows for second consecutive week amid ‘cooling demand’
contentSnippet: Spot Bitcoin ETFs attracted $446 million in weekly inflows, signaling renewed institutional confidence in BTC as Ether funds faced a second straight week of outflows.

title: テザー社、AI事業に本腰　大規模公開データセットとAIアプリをリリース
contentSnippet: テザー社がSTEM分野特化の大規模AIデータセット「QVACジェネシスI」とプライバシー重視アプリ「QVACワークベンチ」をリリースした。AI事業を本格始動させている。

title: テザー　今年2.3兆円の利益見込む、米国向け「USAT」は1億米国ユーザーへのリーチ目指す
contentSnippet: テザーは今年の利益が2.3兆円に達する見込みだ。米国向けのステーブルコインはUSATは12月にローンチ予定。

title: 大口投資家、4日間で74億円相当のソラナを購入　ビットコインの大口購入も
contentSnippet: オンチェーンアナリストの報告によると、大口投資家が直近4日間で約25万ソラナ（SOL）を購入したことが明らかになった。

title: 中規模保有者（ドルフィン）の需要がビットコイン市場を牽引＝CryptoQuantレポート
contentSnippet: CryptoQuantが仮想通貨市場の最新レポートで、中規模保有者「ドルフィン」がビットコインの蓄積を続けていると指摘した。重要な価格水準や動向を解説している。

title: 米民主党議員、トランプ大統領によるCZ氏恩赦を批判
contentSnippet: 米下院金融サービス委員会のランキングメンバーである民主党議員は公式声明で、トランプ米大統領が仮想通貨取引所バイナンスの共同創設者CZ氏に恩赦を与えたことを批判。恩赦の背景などを説明している。

title: JPモルガン、コインベースのBaseトークン発行で最大5兆円の価値創出を予測
contentSnippet: JPモルガンがコインベースのBaseトークン発行により最大340億ドルの価値が創出される可能性があると分析した。

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX Moves $133 Million Worth of Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Elon Musk's space exploration firm, SpaceX, moved $133 million worth of Bitcoin on Friday after transferring funds earlier this week.

title: CZのバイナンス復帰確率高騰、トランプ大統領の恩赦を受け
contentSnippet: トランプ大統領がバイナンス創設者CZを恩赦したことを受け、ポリマーケットでバイナンス経営復帰予測が活発化。確率は一時82%まで急騰後30%付近で推移。トレーダーGarrett Jin氏は恩赦を予測し2倍リターンを達成した。

title: リップル、Hidden Road買収完了でプライムブローカー事業参入
contentSnippet: リップルがヒドゥン・ロードの買収を完了し、仮想通貨企業初のグローバル・プライム・ブローカー運営企業となった。

title: Trump Picks SEC Crypto Task Force’s Mike Selig to Run CFTC: Report
contentSnippet: Selig, chief counsel for the SEC’s pro-crypto task force, is the president’s latest choice to run the CFTC, according to a Bloomberg report.

title: Public Keys: DraftKings Gets Predictable, Canaan Turns Around and Zelle Likes Stables
contentSnippet: DraftKings buys Railbird, Canaan rebounds from near-delisting, and Zelle embraces stablecoins in this week's Public Keys.

title: Custodia, Vantage Expand Pilot Into Live Tokenized Deposit Network for US Banks
contentSnippet: The two banks have moved from pilot to production with a platform that lets U.S. lenders issue interoperable tokenized deposits compliant with the GENIUS Act.

title: ポリマーケット、独自トークン「POLY」発行とエアドロップ実施を正式表明
contentSnippet: 人気イベント賭けサイトのポリマーケットがPOLYトークンの発行とエアドロップを正式に表明した。米国市場再進出後になる見込みだ。

title: YouTube Rival Rumble Teams With Tether to Add Bitcoin Tipping for Creators
contentSnippet: Publicly traded video sharing and livestream platform Rumble is adding Bitcoin tipping for its creator base.

title: スペースX、今週2度目のビットコイン大量移動　ウォレット再編成か
contentSnippet: スペースXが24日に約204億円相当のビットコインを移動したとアーカム・インテリジェンスが報告した。

title: Gold vs Ethereum: Which Hits $5K First? Here’s What the Charts Say
contentSnippet: Ethereum needs a 30% pump while gold requires 20% to reach $5K. But predicting which crosses the finish line first isn't as easy as that. Here's why.

title: Spooky Szn? Bitcoin Options Worth Record $31 Billion Set to Expire on Halloween
contentSnippet: Despite the October flash crash and deleveraging event, Bitcoin traders are in for a record options expiry event at the end of the month. Here's what to expect.

title: Payments Processor Zelle to Use Stablecoins for International Transactions
contentSnippet: The initiative reflects stablecoins' rising significance in the financial services world.
